properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 14 at 1:45PM MST until February 16 at 10:00PM MST by NWS Pocatello ID
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow, moderate to heavy at times. Total snow
accumulations of 4 to 9 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph
at times.

* WHERE...The Teton and Bear Lake Valleys, including Driggs and
Montpelier.

* WHEN...From 6 PM Saturday to 10 PM MST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on difficult to hazardous road conditions at
times.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusty winds may produce areas of blowing
and drifting snow with reduced visibility.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM SATURDAY TO 10 PM MST SUNDAY
